biotools.summary: A new marker-based method developed for abundance profiling of metagenomic data.  It uses a collection of 30 universal marker genes and bins the fragments to the marker genes.  For each set of fragments binned to a marker gene, this classifies the fragments by inserting the fragments into the taxonomic tree estimated on the marker gene.

bioschemas.name: TIPP
bioschemas.summary: A new marker-based method developed for abundance profiling of metagenomic data.  It uses a collection of 30 universal marker genes and bins the fragments to the marker genes.  For each set of fragments binned to a marker gene, this classifies the fragments by inserting the fragments into the taxonomic tree estimated on the marker gene.
